com.onedevapp.nativeplugin

Class AndroidBridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.onedevapp.nativeplugin.AndroidBridge

  • public class AndroidBridge
extends java.lang.Object
    AndroidBridge can invoke Android APIs in the unity.

      OnClick listener for every action

      OnSelect listener for every select action

      • CheckPermission

        public static boolean CheckPermission(android.app.Activity activity,
                                      java.lang.String permission)
        This method checks whether the given permission is already granted or not.
        Parameters:
        activity - This is context of the current activity
        permission - This is the permission we need to check
        Returns:
        boolean Returns True if already permission granted for this permission else false.

      • CheckPermissionRationale

        public static boolean CheckPermissionRationale(android.app.Activity activity,
                                               java.lang.String permission)
        This method checks whether the given permission can show rationale dialog.
        Parameters:
        activity - This is context of the current activity
        permission - This is the permission we need to check
        Returns:
        boolean Returns True if permission is requested but not granted and can show rationale dialog else false.
